xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/1033205-CCTV Monitor 1 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/f2ymXJVyTL0nQFQBi6CBPT1WhyA.jpg A nocturnal journey through the English countryside is imagined through the lenses of a succession of CCTV cameras. The work sleepwalks through a series of empty lanes and meadows, and a sense that all is well with the world prevails until the eerie emptiness of a dual carriageway shifts the mood from benign slumber to postapocalyptic anxiety. Available on Vimeo as a seven-minute three-screen version. CCTV Monitor 1
